item.title: Wtf? cant pickup HELP?!
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

looks like the same code as mine, and it works

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 3)) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMsg("No such item."); } } else { sendMsg("Wrong Syntax! Please use it as ::pickup [ID] [AMOUNT]."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf? cant pickup HELP?!
item.dc:creator: @tajkillerscape tajkillerscape
item.description:
@tajkillerscape wrote:

:mad: ok look i do ::pickup and it worked 1 time and tryed it again for other things and it’s not working!!! wtf?!?! HELP!?!?

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 3)) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMsg("No such item."); } } else { sendMsg("Wrong Syntax! Please use it as ::pickup [ID] [AMOUNT]."); }
